devdoc.details: Since Optimism bridge reequires manually providing the L2 token address, the contract owner must set the L2 token address before bridging.

bridge(address,address,uint256).details: The function will revert if the L2 token address is not set

returns._0: True if the bridger is active

constructor.details: Arbitrum bridge requires base fee for the fee calculation therefore the function may revert on evm implementations that do not support base fee

params._OP_SDL: SDL token address on Optimism chain
params._SDL: SDL token address on this chain
params._gasLimit: Gas limit for the L2 transaction

cost().details: The gas cost for bridging is 0 on Ethereum mainnet

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

pause().details: Only the owner can call this function and overriding contracts should implement `whenNotPaused` modifier to their bridge function

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setGasLimit(uint32).details: The function can only be called by the contract owner

setL2TokenPair(address,address).details: The function can only be called by the contract owner

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

unpause().details: Only the owner can call this function

devdoc.title: Optimism bridger contract

bridge(address,address,uint256).notice: Bridge given token to Optimism network

check(address).notice: Check if this bridge can be used

constructor.notice: This contract is used to bridge tokens to Arbitrum

cost().notice: Get the network cost for bridging tokens to Optimism

setGasLimit(uint32).notice: Set gas limit to use for bridging

setL2TokenPair(address,address).notice: Set L2 token address for the given L1 token and approve the bridge to transfer the L1 token

userdoc.notice: This contract is used to bridge tokens to Optimism network
